content: "Sorry, Tom, you can't castle because my bishop controls the f1 square." "Can't you move it somewhere else?"
translations: ita:Scusa, Tom, non puoi arroccare perché il mio alfiere controlla lo scacco f1. Non puoi spostarlo da qualche altra parte﹖
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
